title: Social Education Project Design Utilizing XR Technology and OER/OEP

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational methodologies and general understanding of digital tools
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to learn XR technology-based educational content creation and application methods, performing projects based on open educational resources (OER) and practices (OEP) in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the educational applicability and limitations of XR technologies (VR/AR/MR).
Learners can design XR educational scenarios linked to social studies subjects that reflect OER/OEP principles.
Learners can create and test small-scale XR educational content using smartphone-based FOSS tools.
Learners can propose sustainable sharing systems for XR educational resources through collaborative platforms.

resources: Free XR Creation Tools (e.g., CoSpaces, Unity Personal)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
